game.title: The Lost Sword
game.objective: Retrieve the lost sword of King Arthur
game.description: In this epic quest, you must embark on a journey to find the legendary sword of King Arthur, Excalibur. The sword has been lost for centuries and is said to possess magical powers. It is believed to be hidden deep within the Enchanted Forest, guarded by mythical creatures and treacherous obstacles. Are you brave enough to take on this challenge and become the savior of the kingdom?
game.reward: Upon successfully finding the sword, you will be rewarded with untold riches and eternal fame.

task.description: Your first task is to locate the entrance to the Enchanted Forest. Talk to the locals, gather clues, and follow the ancient map left by King Arthur himself.
task.location: Shire Village at the Edge of the Woods
